title: The World Isn't Flat, But It Isn't Round Either...
itunes:title: The World Isn't Flat, But It Isn't Round Either...

description:
It's something else...

***

Written by Derek Walker

***

Bonus Episode: "My sister and I went to a cabin in the middle of winter" written by EekPeek and narrated by Alicia Atkins

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Title music by Alex Aldea


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
